Order your {elliot.js} license

You are about to order a of {elliot.js} graphing library. Please complete the form below, all fields are mandatory. We will process your request as soon as possible and send you an e-mail as well as a payment request from Paypal. You can pay using MasterCard or VISA.

Do I need to wait for my license before I can start using {elliot.js}? No, you can start implementing right away. Just grab your copy of {elliot.js} from the webpage. As soon as the payment is completed you will recieve your licens and you can then go a head and deploy {elliot.js} to your production environment.

Along with your license is also the URL to the hosted versions of {elliot.js}. Those versions are hosted on a Content Delivery Network which you - as a {elliot.js} license holder - is free to use.
